    Paralysis faced the mighty mouse. "Well, Megatron had abandoned them and 
fled. Right now there scattered, with no leader, and there under massive 
attack. The least we could do is cover them until they organized and then we 
can return here....from here I guess we'll start a counter attack. They have 
no choice, they follow us or they...um....perish."
